definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[ירק]] (√ of foll.; NH Hiph.; Aram. Aph. [[אוֹרִיק]] grow green; yireq be pale, and deriv.; As. arâḳu, grow pale (of face), arḳu, yellow, green, etc., Dl:HWB 243; Ar. waraqun leaf, waraqa put forth leaves, cf. wurqah;un ash-colour, 0wraqu dusky-white, of camel, wariqa silver coin Lag:BN 30; Sab. [[ורק]] gold ([[כתם וורק]]), Hal:Es, JAs. Dêc. 1874, Nos. 47, 97 DHM:VOJ i. 26 f., and Eth. warq: gold, both from colour acc. to DHM Di).
